name: Enigma (itch) (lrdazrl, ReKon)
description:
Solve cryptographic puzzles intercepted from enemy units during war. Based on the information gained from enemy messages, give orders to your units in order to win the war. In a constant time pressure, player has to handle both solving the cryptograms and making difficult decisions that will change the future of the whole nations. To win the war, you must balance between using the information you gain and not letting the enemy force know that you are able to crack their messages.

Will you win the war and with what price?

This game was made for GGJ 2022
